director.name: 瓦莉·艾丝波特 Valie Export

this_title: Ein perfektes Paar oder die Unzucht wechselt ihre Haut
introduction: Once, nudity was deemed indecent. Now, nudity is used and abused to peddle our era’s very own indecency: the marketability of seemingly everything – naked bodies for naked greed. Another Exportian tract, this time performed with cool touches of glamour and serious amounts of scathing wit. A politically visionary work.
chinese_title: Ein perfektes Paar oder die Unzucht wechselt ihre Haut
